```{r}
hr <- read.csv("C:/Users/User/Downloads/HR_Analytics.csv", header=T)
str(hr)

```

```{r}

which(duplicated(hr))

```
```{r}

hr <- hr[!duplicated(hr), ]


which(duplicated(hr))


```



```{r}

colSums(is.na(hr))

```
Only 57 missing values out of 1480 observations in the column 'YearsWithCurrManager'. Therefore, we proceed with removing observations with these missing values.


```{r}
hr_clean <- na.omit(hr)
str(hr_clean)

colSums(is.na(hr_clean))
```

```{r}

write.csv(hr_clean, file = "C:/Users/User/Downloads/hr_analytics_clean.csv" )

```
